data.name: itop_platform_get_contractbyid
data.value: SELECT `{0}`.`tblC`.`id`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`name`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`org_id`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`organization_name`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`description`, GROUP_CONCAT(`{0}`.`tblCS`.`service_id_friendlyname`,' (',`{0}`.`tblCS`.`coveragewindow_id_friendlyname`,')' ORDER BY `{0}`.`tblCS`.`service_id_friendlyname` DESC SEPARATOR ' + ') AS services, `{0}`.`tblC`.`start_date`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`end_date`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`provider_id`, `{0}`.`tblC`.`provider_name` FROM `{0}`.`_itopview_contract` `tblC`, `{0}`.`_itopview_lnkcustomercontracttoservice` `tblCS` WHERE `{0}`.`tblC`.`id` = `{0}`.`tblCS`.`customercontract_id` AND `{0}`.`tblC`.`status` = 'production' AND `{0}`.`tblC`.`contracttype_id` = 39 AND `{0}`.`tblC`.`provider_id_friendlyname` = 'KAPPA10 LTDA' AND `{0}`.`tblC`.`id` = {1} GROUP BY `{0}`.`tblC`.`id`;
data.comment: Consulta que se envia para recuperar un contrato por su id.
